doc.title: Baba de wanju
doc.plot: This is the touching and poignant story of memorial and emotional loss, as experienced by father and son. Having lost his memory, the father tries to chase and cling on to an ambiguous and faded past, within the confines of the remaining days of his life. Having lost his father, the son experiences, for the first time, the irreparable sense of regret and loneliness in the long nights.
